comment.author: 30937372@N00
comment._content: I would guess this is a view of Fort <u>Jameson</u> (now Chipata), not 'Famesan'

comment.author: 59430401@N06
comment._content: Definitely Fort Jameson, probably taken from the hill above the Boma.  Church can be seen one third down, one third from the right.
